objectives: Students will discuss travel and tourism using Formal/Business register language
Students will engage with Historical themed scenarios related to travel and tourism
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of formal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining travel and tourism content with Historical narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore travel and tourism through a Historical lens using Formal/Business language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a historical period or event involving travel and tourism

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice formal register vocabulary related to travel and tourism in a historical context
Students engage in historical themed role-play about travel and tourism using formal register
Students create original historical themed content about travel and tourism in formal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe travel and tourism in a Historical scenario?
What tradition or heritage might be involved in travel and tourism?
Can you create a Historical story about travel and tourism?
How does travel and tourism change when viewed through a Historical perspective?
What formal register expressions would you use to discuss this historical scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Historical situation involving travel and tourism
roles: Character A: Using formal register in historical context
Character B: Responding in formal register within historical theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Formal/Business throughout: Professional, business-appropriate language
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Historical theme: Past eras, historical events, period settings

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Formal/Business register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Historical themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of formal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
